mapper.sql: id, name, serial_number, location, intranet_address, extranet_address, port, context, version, last_alive, alive, remark
mapper.select:
select
from tb_box_config where extranet_address=#{ip} and id in(select box_id from tb_box_user_relate where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.insert: insert into tb_box_config (id, name, serial_number, location, intranet_address, extranet_address, port, context, version,last_alive, alive, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intranetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extranetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastAlive,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update tb_box_config
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intranet_address = #{intranetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extranet_address = #{extranetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},

last_alive = #{lastAlive,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
alive = #{alive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

intranet_address = #{intranetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
